/api/sso-connector-factories.summary: APIs for SSO (single sign-on) connector factories
/api/sso-connector-factories.description: SSO connector factories are used to create Enterprise SSO connectors. The created connectors are used to connect to external SSO providers.

get.description: Returns all SSO connector factories, including standard protocol factories and pre-configured SSO providers (e.g. Google Workspace, Okta, etc.).

200.description: An array of SSO connector factories.
